root: ^Hello Warrior. Are you on your way to the final boss? I don't think your weapon is strong enough to defeat the boss. You need to go back and talk to the Blacksmith so he can upgrade your weapon!
^Thanks. I'll go back and meet him.

c-0: ^Well.. there's nothing wrong if you want to challenge yourself... But I must warn you that it is almost impossible to defeat the boss with your current weapon. If you want to see the boss anyway, just follow the trails!
